name: Sausage Casserole
author: WILLIAM ROSSBACH
summary: Mouth watering, bowl scraping good! This recipe also makes a great dinner entree!
ingredients: 3 cups shredded potatoes, drained and pressed
1 (16 ounce) container small curd cottage cheese
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Lightly grease a 9x13 inch square baking dish
Place sausage in a large, deep skillet
Cook over medium-high heat until evenly brown
In the prepared baking dish, stir together the shredded potatoes and butter
Line the bottom and sides of the baking dish with the mixture
In a bowl, mix the sausage, Cheddar cheese, onion, cottage cheese, and eggs
Bake 1 hour in the preheated oven, or until a toothpick inserted into center of the casserole comes out clean
Let cool for 5 minutes before serving
